errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependencies (opencv-python tensorflow) to the pip install command that are not required for roiextractors
Incorrect order of installation steps - pip install is executed before creating and activating the conda environment
correction_candidates:
git clone https://github.com/catalystneuro/roiextractors
cd roiextractors
conda env create roiextractors_env
conda activate roiextractors_env
pip install -e .

git clone https://github.com/catalystneuro/roiextractors
cd roiextractors
conda create -n roiextractors_env python=3.9
conda activate roiextractors_env
pip install -e .

git clone https://github.com/catalystneuro/roiextractors
cd roiextractors
conda env create -f environment.yml
conda activate roiextractors_env
pip install -e .

git clone https://github.com/catalystneuro/roiextractors
cd roiextractors
python -m venv roiextractors_env
source roiextractors_env/bin/activate
pip install -e .
errors.golden_answer:
git clone https://github.com/catalystneuro/roiextractors
cd roiextractors
conda env create roiextractors_env
conda activate roiextractors_env
pip install -e .
